name: DataRequirement.limit
title: DataRequirement.limit
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Specifies a maximum number of results that are required (uses the _count search parameter).
element.comment: This element can be used in combination with the sort element to specify quota requirements such as "the most recent 5" or "the highest 5".
element.requirements: Enables the requirement "most recent 5 results" to be expressed.
